info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 4:02PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lane County through 430 PM PDT... At 402 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hills Creek Reservoir, or near Oakridge, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oakridge, Hills Creek Reservoir, Westfir and Hampton. In Oregon this includes State Highway 58 between mile markers 23 and 41. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
